== Summary ==
 
From the [https://wordpress.org/news/2017/04/wordpress-4-7-4/ WordPress 4.7.4 release post]: WordPress 3.7.20 contains 47 maintenance fixes and enhancements from [[Version 3.7.19]], including an incompatibility between the upcoming Chrome version and the visual editor, and inconsistencies in media handling. For more information, consult the [https://core.trac.wordpress.org/query?status=closed&milestone=4.7.4&group=component&col=id&col=summary&col=component&col=status&col=owner&col=type&col=priority&col=keywords&order=priority list of changes].
